name: Finger Balance FREE
description:
Coconut Island Midweek Insanity: Our new game "Mister Frog" goes free. It's a super addictive game! Check it out.

Featured by Apple in "Gravity Puzzlers" & "The Best Games You've Never Played"
Nominated as Most Innovative Game at International Mobile Gaming Awards(IMGA)
No.1 Top Overall free Apps in US, UK, Germany, Hong Kong, Taiwan,Finland!
No.1 Board Game in US, UK, Germany, France, Canada, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Denmark, Russia!
No.1 Puzzel Game in US, UK, Germany, France, Denmark,Hong Kong,Taiwan, Russia!
Full version of this game ranked # 6 Top Paid Apps in US, #1 Top Puzzle Games in US, Germany, #1 Top Board Games in US, UK, Germany. Featured as "What's Hot" "New and Noteworthy"

Featuring innovative and unique gameplay never seen before in the App Store, Coconut Island, maker of iDragPaper with 7 million players worldwide, is proud to present to you Finger Balance, brand new one of its kind puzzle game for iPhone.

Test the dexterity and stability of your fingers, by balancing a ball on a rod and navigate through challenging and fun levels.

Reveiw:
“Finger Balance is a new type of physics inspired puzzler for the iPhone that is sure to be a favorite among challenge loving gamers.” - AppSafari rating 4/5

“Finger Balance by Coconut Island is one of those rare games where you can't help but wonder why it took so long to come about.” - AppSpy.com rating 4/5

"If you're the kind of insane superbeing who used to happily spend hours trying to ride the 0.1 bar from end to end on the guitar-string level of Super Monkey Ball, then with Finger Balance you can spark similar obsessive-compulsive tendencies off once again." - Eurogamer.net rating 8/10

"This insanely addictive physics puzzler has all the right elements of a classic casual game." - appSIZED rating 4.5/5

"With laborious mazes, easy graphics, and a modest price tag, Finger Balance is a should buy!" - appadvice rating "SHOULD BUY"

"Mi intrigano soprattutto i giochini semplici ma davvero originali. È proprio il caso di questo Finger Balance." - iPhoneItalia

Gameplay:
You're given a rod and a ball on it. Your objective is raise and lower both ends of the rod to balance the ball and navigate it through obstacles.

Features:
- Unique gameplay you have never experienced before
- Instant reply. Relive the best 6 glory moments of your accomplishment
- 19 Levels in different difficulties (90 levels and 3 game modes in full version)
- 8 Achievements (23 in full version)
- Level editor (can only save one user-generated level in free version while unlimited in paid version)
- Retro style graphics
- Original background music and sound effects
- OpenFeint online leader board
- Score publishing with Facebook and Twitter
- Access integrated game community in-game
Next update: User-generated levels uploading, downloading and rating!

Gameplay video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Hizt_gU_PU
Official guide video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fR6YwhKtcoY

Just remember to use your finger tips to move the rod and touch as little screen area as possible!

Please support our new game "One Tap Hero Free", an award-winning cute puzzle platformmer!
Search "One Tap Hero" in App Store
